subject: Call For Papers
from: "The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
Dear Colleague: We would like to update you about the following conferences. We hope that you consider submitting your research paper for one of them. THANK YOU. 1- The Second International Conference on Digital Enterprise and Information Systems (DEIS 2013) Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia1/ ============================================= 2- The Second International Conference on e-Technologies and Networks for Development (ICeND 2013) Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia2/ ============================================= 3- The Second International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Warfare and Digital Forensic (CyberSec2013) Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia3/ ============================================= 4- The First International Conference on Green Computing, Technology and Innovation Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia4/ ============================================= 5- The International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2013) Bangkok, Thailand, May 7-9, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/ebw2013/ ============================================= 6- The International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2013) Kinya, Turkey, May 9-11, 2013 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/ ============================================= ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 Dear Colleague:

We would like to update you about the following conferences. We hope that you consider submitting your research paper for one of them. THANK YOU.


1- The Second International Conference on Digital Enterprise and Information Systems (DEIS 2013)
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia1/

=============================================

2- The Second International Conference on e-Technologies and Networks for Development (ICeND 2013)
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia2/

=============================================

3- The Second International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Warfare and Digital Forensic (CyberSec2013)
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia3/

=============================================

4- The First International Conference on Green Computing, Technology and Innovation
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, March 4-6, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/Malaysia4/

=============================================

5- The International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2013)
Bangkok, Thailand, May 7-9, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/ebw2013/

=============================================

6- The International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2013)
Kinya, Turkey, May 9-11, 2013
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2013/taeece2013/

=============================================
